# selectedImageTintColor

**Instance Property**

The tint color applied to the selected tab bar item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedImageTintColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`, which results in use of the tab bar’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar/tintColor] property.

## Configuring selection appearance

- **unselectedItemTintColor**: The tint color to apply to unselected tabs.
- **selectionIndicatorImage**: The image to use for the selection indicator.
